titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of NYU Shanghai RG.50
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-12-14 08:47:08 -0500.

physdesc.extent: in 1 manuscript box and 1 half manuscript box

did.abstract: New York University Shanghai (NYU Shanghai) is a university established jointly by New York University and East China Normal University of Shanghai in 2012. The student population is approximately 1,300 undergraduate and graduate students, about half of whom are from China. The Records of NYU Shanghai consists of materials documenting the school's campus, courses, and students. Materials in this collection include ephemera, course catalogs, and other publications dated approximately 2013-2018.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
did.langmaterial: Materials are in English and Chinese.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by NYU Shanghai are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact University Archives, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: There is no documentation concerning the provenance of this collection. In January 2020 an accretion of publications and ephemera was transferred to the University Archives by Ree DeDonato, Adjunct Librarian for Abu Dhabi Collections; the accession number associated with this transfer is 2020.008.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Records of NYU Shanghai; RG.50; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders and described on the collection-level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Records of NYU Shanghai consists of materials documenting the school's campus, courses, and students. Materials in this collection include ephemera, course catalogs, and other publications dated approximately 2013-2018.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: New York University Shanghai (NYU Shanghai) is a university established jointly by New York University and East China Normal University of Shanghai in 2012. The student population is approximately 1,300 undergraduate and graduate students, about half of whom are from China.
